Find the center of the galaxy

achievement.name: Empire Builder
achievement.description: Maximize colonies on 10 planets

achievement.name: General Custer
achievement.description: Lead 30 posse members to their death

achievement.name: Careless Parent
achievement.description: Lose 5 planets

achievement.name: Military
achievement.description: Military civilizations thrive on weapons and force. They'll use every resource available to destroy other nations.

achievement.name: Aggressive
achievement.description: Aggressive tribes try to exterminate the competition. They ruthlessly attack and hoard all the resources for themselves.

achievement.name: Predator
achievement.description: Predatory creatures spend their lives searching for prey. They'd sooner make extinct an entire species than "dance" or "charm".

achievement.name: Zealot
achievement.description: Zealots are certain that their beliefs are the only truth that matters. Those who do not feel the same way are not worthy to exist in this galaxy.

achievement.name: Economic
achievement.description: Economic civilizations use cash and trade routes to influence other nations. They'll make alliances, but it's usually a better deal for them.

achievement.name: Bard
achievement.description: Bards are the social, outgoing entertainers of the cosmos. The galaxy is their personal playground.

achievement.name: Omnivore
achievement.description: Omnivorous cells eat any type of food available.

achievement.name: Friendly
achievement.description: Friendly tribes understand the importance of teamwork. They form alliances to share resources and prosper with other tribes.

achievement.name: Religious
achievement.description: Religious civilizations harness the power of words and ideas to convert other nations to their way of thinking.

achievement.name: Scientist
achievement.description: Scientists are logical and calculating. The galaxy exists to be studied and understood.

achievement.name: Wanderer
achievement.description: Wanderers want to sample a little bit of everything. The galaxy is vast and they want to experience it all.

achievement.name: Herbivore
achievement.description: Herbivorous cells consume a diet of plant matter.

achievement.name: Ecologist
achievement.description: Ecologists are the protectors of nature. Species that attempt to exploit and corrupt the galaxy must be exterminated.

achievement.name: Diplomat
achievement.description: Diplomats are negotiators and problem solvers. Peace will come to the galaxy only through open communication between species.

achievement.name: Trader
achievement.description: Traders are in it for the profit. Their only allegiance is to the almighty Sporebuck.

achievement.name: Adaptable
achievement.description: Adaptable creatures have many friends and many enemies. They make choices based on the current situation.

achievement.name: Industrious
achievement.description: Industrious tribes seize the moment, attacking or forming alliances when necessary. They make great allies, but watch out.

achievement.name: Shaman
achievement.description: Shamans understand that all life shares a common bond. The entire galaxy exists within us all.

achievement.name: Carnivore
achievement.description: Carnivorous cells consume a diet of meat.

achievement.name: Warrior
achievement.description: Warriors take what they want and never ask for permission. The galaxy is a prize to be claimed by the strongest.

achievement.name: Knight
achievement.description: Knights are noble warriors that fight for right, not for personal gain. Peace will come to the galaxy only when evil has been vanquished.

achievement.name: Social
achievement.description: Social creatures are constantly searching for new friends and allies. Meeting a new species is the highlight of their day.
